generic: You have to tell what food or cuisine you want.
I am a jiak bot. I'm not so smart. You have to tell me where you want to jiak or what you want to jiak.
Wah ... Cheem. I don't understand ... Can you tell me what food or cuisine you like?
unknown_location: eh I only know CBD now ...
I'm at CBD ... Don't go too far lah
Sorry, sir - Jiakbot is not that well travelled. CBD only lah please.
rhetoric: Then you still say for what?
Nothing much to say about that lor
Not sure what you expect me to reply
question: Food please ... food or cuisine
I only know about food ... don't like that lah
unknown_food_cuisine: You sure Singapore got sell this thing?
Your taste is too exotic lah. Try other food.
no_result: Pai seh ... I really cannot find
Can't find anything now. Maybe after I travel more, I would be able to recommend something. Try something else for now?
request_yes_no: I give you food already lah. Okay or not?
At least tell me does this suit you taste?
Don't like that lah, tell me is my recommendation okay or not?
recommend: Give me some foods or cuisines you like
What food you like to have today?
Tell me some cuisines you like.
request_food_cuisine: Give me some other foods or cuisines you like
What other food you like to have today?
Tell me some other cuisines you like.
